quotes_by_people.author: Albert Einstein
quotes_by_people.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.

quotes_by_people.author: Isaac Newton
quotes_by_people.quote: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants.

quotes_by_people.author: Jason Kidd
quotes_by_people.quote: We're going to turn this team around 360 degrees

quotes_by_people.author: Jaden Smith
quotes_by_people.quote: If Everybody In The World Dropped Out Of School We Would Have A Much More Intelligent Society.

quotes_by_people.author: Jaden Smith
quotes_by_people.quote: How Can Mirrors Be Real If Our Eyes Aren't Real?

quotes_by_people.author: Shaquille O'Neal
quotes_by_people.quote: Our offense is like the pythagorean theorem: There is no answer!

quotes_by_people.author: Britney Spears
quotes_by_people.quote: I've never really wanted to go to Japan. Simply because I don’t like eating fish. And I know that's very popular out there in Africa.

quotes_by_people.author: Dan Quayle
quotes_by_people.quote: It's time for the human race to enter the solar system!

quotes_by_people.author: Paris Hilton
quotes_by_people.quote: No, no, I didn’t go to England, I went to London

quotes_by_people.author: George Gobel
quotes_by_people.quote: If it weren't for electricity, we'd all be watching television by candlelight

quotes_by_people.author: Katy Perry
quotes_by_people.quote: I'm so obsessed with you I want to skin you and wear you like Versace.
